#summary Understanding the parts that the hexagon project is made of.

= Introduction =

The _hexagon project_ is made of three different parts - two code libraries and a code framework - namely *hexagon lib*, *tetragon lib* and *rhombus framework*. This page will give an overview about the purpose of these three parts and how they interrelate to each other.
